title: Yellowstone National Park: Interactive Features
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Interactive Features              Interactive Features       Virtual Visitor Center Multimedia Collection Explore the exhibits and features of the Old Faithful Virtual Visitor Center.  Nez Perce Historic Trail Interactive Google Map For people unable to physically visit the Nez Perce National Historic Trail, the option is now available for them to travel the entire length of the trail using Google Maps and Google Earth. The map provides details the 1877 flight of the Nez Perce from their homelands along a 1,170-mile-journey that passes through Yellowstone National Park.
